game.name: Leonardo's Island
game.genres: Action, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 함선을 건조하라. 대포를 장전하라. 혼돈이 시작된다! 온라인에서 PvP 레가타와 해전에 뛰어들어 강력한 업그레이드를 해금하고 바다를 정복하라. 잘 만들어진 함선이 위대한 승리의 열쇠다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build a ship. Load the cannons. Let the chaos begin! Jump into online PvP regattas and naval battles, unlock powerful upgrades, and rule the seas. A well-built ship is the key to victory!
